title: In Between
overview: Taurus and Otep are childhood friends who became inseparable. As they grow closer Otep develops feelings for Taurus and sees him as more than just a friend or a brother. Otep confesses to Taurus and to his surprise, Taurus accepts his love but only if it is in secret. However, Otep's happiness doesn't last that long as Taurus leaves him unexpectedly. Fate brings them back together after a year, but will their rekindled romance be enough this time?
